channel.title: Requirements on Introduction to Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Requirements on Introduction to Kubernetes

item.title: Exercises
item.description: To complete this workshop you will need these repos cloned locally Github Register an account at github.com and clone these repos Microservices Exercises Kubernetes Exercises

item.title: Connecting
item.description: CLUSTER_NAME = k8s-workshop Set up the gcloud sdk gcloud init Set gcloud project env var PROJECT_ID=${1:-devnexus-k8s-workshop}; gcloud config set project ${PROJECT_ID}; gcloud config set compute/region us-east1; gcloud config set compute/zone us-east1-b; Check to make sure account can see glcoud container clusters list Get the cluster credentials gcloud container clusters get-credentials ${CLUSTER_NAME}; Make kubectl can see the cluster kubectl cluster-info Allow docker to push to GCR bash gcloud auth configure-docker ```bash The following settings will be added to your Docker config file located at [/Users/contino/.
